greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The arithmetic derivative of n, modulo 2.
comment: Characteristic function of A235991: a(A235991(n))=1 and a(A235992(n))=0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 11 2014
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: for n from 0 by 1 to i do
mathematica: d[0] = d[1] = 0; d[n_] := n*Total[f = FactorInteger[n]; f[[All, 2]]/f[[All, 1]] ]; a[n_] := Mod[d[n], 2]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 104}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Apr 22 2015 *)
program: a165560 = flip mod 2 . a003415  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 11 2014
results.author: _Paolo P. Lava_ & _Giorgio Balzarotti_, Sep 24 2009
ext: Entries checked by _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 07 2009
